name: Operation Demo Importer â€“ Demo Importer For WPoperation Themes
author: WPoperation

sections.description:
This is the demo importer plugin for WPOperation themes.

Features

Adds Demo Import Functiolanity to the WordPress Themes By WPOperation
Translation Ready
Lifetime Free support
Constant updates
sections.installation:
1. Unzip wpop-demo-importer.zip
  2. Upload all the files to the /wp-content/plugins/operation-demo-importer
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
What does this plugin do?

This plugin will add feature to import demos to the themes by WPOperation

  • Set to enable fontawesome 4

1.1.1

  • Compatibility check for premium themes

1.1.0

  • Added support for Opstore Pro and Ultra Eleven themes

1.0.9

  • Refined functions and styles

1.0.8

  • Improved Importer Function
  • Added function to fetch demo datas from external server
  • Changed user interface

1.0.7

  • Added Function to add screenshots from external links
  • Checked class exists for smart slider

1.0.6

  • Added support for Premium theme Opstore Pro

1.0.5

1.0.4

  • Added support for smart slider

1.0.2
